text: @JoeBiden @Lawrence Trump cares for no one other than himself. After all this time, he still doesn't know what COVID-19 means. He said it's a silly name and doesn't understand why it has a 19. He's totally absorbed in his campaign and no longer even makes a pretense of caring about our lives.
